name: How I Lost $1000
description:
• A short visual novel on how did I lose $1000
  • Based on my real experience, happened on 2018 Christmas Eve
  • Was trying to make different types of mini games and timeline cut scenes between different novel sections, but really ran out of time... so the first auto runer is the only little game that's kind of playable
  • hope you enjoy the story and learn from my mistakes xp
  • forgive me if you encountered any critical bugs
